author: rfrazin@thehill.com (Rachel Frazin)
title: GOP senators urge Saudi Arabia to leave OPEC
description: A group of Republican senators are saying that Saudi Arabia should leave the Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) and instead become a “free market energy powerhouse.”The six senators wrote a letter to Secretary of...
content:
A group of Republican senators are saying that Saudi Arabia should leave OPEC and instead become a free market energy powerhouse.
The six senators wrote a letter to Secretary of State Mike PompeoMichael (Mike) Richard PompeoChina: Pompeo has 'sinister motive… [+3627 chars]
